column6: REVEALING THE ORIGINS OF ONE OF DISNEY'S MOST IMAGINATIVE CHARACTERS! An all-new steampunk fantasy story exploring the never-before-revealed first adventure of the inventor known as Dreamfinder and his famous dragon Figment! Chomped…by Chimera! Acclaimed creators Jim Zub (Skullkickers) and Filipe Andrade (CAPTAIN MARVEL) give a Marvel spin to the mind-expanding attraction Journey Into Imagination!
column8: | penciller (cover):John Tyler Christopher | artist:Filipe Daniel Moreno De Andrade | writer:Jim Zub
